title: Introducing: The Psychologists are In - A Psych Rewatch Podcast
description:
We would like to introduce you to one of our favorite new podcasts “The Psychologists Are In” - a Psych re-watch podcast hosted by Maggie Lawson and Timothy Omundson. Each week they talk about your favorite episodes from the show, share behind-the-scenes stories, incredible memories, and have drop-in visits from their best friends and fellow cast mates. Some of our favorite episodes they’ve talked about include stories of a man claiming a ghost is trying to kill him, a girl's death at a mental facility bearing resemblance to that of a local urban legend, the death of a famous tennis star, and a local weatherman found dead by the hands of his secret love affair. And you can follow the show on their Instagram @thepsychologistsarein

Follow/subscribe: apple.co/psych
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
